verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The Lord is here
is dwelling in this place,
The Lord is here
is dwelling in this place

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He's come to health
He's come to free
He's come to break every principality
He's come to health
He comes to free the captives

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We are freeeeeeee!!!
My power's on the name of Jesus,,
He comes..
